movie_title: There’s a Murderer in the Hall of Mirrors - Key & Peele
introduction: A detective tracks a serial killer into a hall of mirrors, where he has trouble telling what’s real
tags: key and peele hall of mirrors

vocabulary.definition: a position of advantage or control over someone or something
vocabulary.example: Even though the opponent was skilled, she managed to gain the upper hand in the chess game.
The storm outside was intensifying, with thunder and lightning growing more frequent.

vocabulary.definition: a person who murders an important person for political or religious reasons
vocabulary.example: The assassin silently approached his target, ready to carry out the mission.

vocabulary.definition: to pull the trigger of a gun back so that it is ready to fire
vocabulary.example: He cocks the gun before aiming at the target in the shooting range.

vocabulary.definition: in a way that shows a lack of hope or enthusiasm
vocabulary.example: She stared out of the window bleakly, thinking about the difficult challenges ahead.
The crowd was thinning as the event came to an end, with people starting to leave.
